Package net.regsirius06.engine.point

Class LightSource

java.lang.Object
net.regsirius06.engine.point.Point
net.regsirius06.engine.point.ColoredPoint
net.regsirius06.engine.point.WallType
net.regsirius06.engine.point.LightSource
public class LightSource extends WallType
The LightSource class represents a light-emitting source in the 2D space. It extends WallType and is specifically associated with the WallEnum.LIGHT type. This class allows the creation of light sources with different colors, which can be used in simulations or visual representations.

  • Field Details

    • COLORS

      public static final List<Color> COLORS
      A list of predefined colors for light sources. These colors represent different possible light source colors.

  • Constructor Details

    • LightSource

      public LightSource(double x, double y, Color color)
      Constructs a new LightSource at the specified x and y coordinates with the given color. The type is automatically set to WallEnum.LIGHT.
      Parameters:
      x - the x coordinate of the light source
      y - the y coordinate of the light source
      color - the color of the light source

    • LightSource

      public LightSource(@NotNull @NotNull Point point, Color color)
      Constructs a new LightSource at the specified Point location with the given color. The type is automatically set to WallEnum.LIGHT.
      Parameters:
      point - the Point to copy coordinates from
      color - the color of the light source
